comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Beatrice O'Brien (1882-1976), daughter of an Irish baron, the first Mrs. Guglielmo Marconi (mother to three of his children), later married the Marchese Liborio Marignoli; a much later portrait of her: www.askart.com/askart/r/carlo_romagnoli/carlo_romagnoli.aspx
